tool.name: List Coref Documents
tool.description: Lists all keys in the BIONLP2016 coreference corpus.
tool.help:
Obtains a list of ID values for all documents in the BioNLP coreference corpus.
**Description** Includes annotations for anaphors bound by protein or event references, produced semi-automatically. 338 anaphora structures are annotated for 218 anaphor expressions, which are bound by 320 antecedents.
